headline: 3 Reasons BK is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Since December 2020, the S&P 500 has delivered a total return of 84.2%. But one standout stock has more than doubled the market - over the past five years, BNY has surged 189% to $117.00 per share. Its momentum hasn’t stopped as it’s also gained 29.3% in the last six months thanks to its solid quarterly results, beating the S&P by 16.2%.
